channel.title: mushroom on Flo's Food and Drink
channel.description: Recent content in mushroom on Flo's Food and Drink

item.title: Gills Mushroom Tart
item.description: River Cottage head chef Gill Meller’s mushrooms, pastry and pancetta, taken from the Hugh’s Three Good Things on More4. Hugh’s recognised a simple pattern that underpins so many well-loved dishes – that they are little more or less than three good things on a plate and in this series, he pursues that idea, experimenting with different flavours and textures. Prep time10 - 15 mins Cook Time15 - 20 mins Servings2 - 4

item.title: Chicken with Green Peppercorns and Oyster Mushrooms
item.description: (serves 2-3) Ingredients 4 chicken breasts 5g/1oz butter 1tbsp/15ml olive oil salt and crushed black pepper Sauce: Ѕmall white onion, peeled and chopped 1 clove of garlic, peeled and chopped 100ml white wine 4tbsp green peppercorns, crushed small bunch parsley, finely chopped 125ml double cream olive oil salt and pepper Garnish: 200g/7oz oyster mushrooms 1 clove garlic (peeled and chopped) small bunch flat leaf parsley, chopped 25g/1oz butter salt and pepper Method Season the chicken and cook in the oil and butter until browned.
